body:
## What happened

Working on test app, Android Studio IDE alerted me with error and provided below message.

## Version information

Android Studio `3.2.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 31.1.1` • Dart plugin `181.5656`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report! Closing as we have some other issues that covers this (we need to do a better job of not reporting some types of expected errors to users as exceptions).

title: IDE crash error
